channel.title: The Flash
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "The Flash" - Wanna see me run to that mountain and back?... Wanna see me do it again?

item.title: Re: The Flash
item.content:encoded: The Pirate Grog, but it won't do anything either. All the Sanin Theme items were meant to be used in the Drift Racers expansion that has been pushed way way way back due to Pirate, SWATBU, the upcoming Dating Sim section, the recode, etc.

item.title: The Flash
item.content:encoded:
Well, according to the mission page, "The Flash" theme only unlocks one item drop: drunken pirate flag from the sneak up on a pirate mission. It struck me as odd that a whole theme be devoted to finding an item that has no particular purpose than having a decent resell value.

SO my question is whether or not anyone is aware of other drops? Or maybe is it was a fairly recent addition that maybe not all the drops have been found yet? Because I have 2 opening themes, The Flash and Hey, Hey, We're the Ninja! so I'm not sure if I should go for The flash in case I might stumble across a new hidden legacy-only item, or if I should just be satisfied with the +20 stamina?

Just curious because themes are new to me :).
